channel.description: YouTube Video Updated Authorized Roles Middleware The authorized-roles.js file shown in the video is out of date. Refer to the code below for a corrected version. Corrections are discussed in the Errata chapter. Token Middlewares Now that we finally have a working authentication system, we can start to add role-based authorization to our application. This will ensure that only users with specific roles can perform certain actions within our RESTful API.
